import React , {useState} from 'react' import './Profile.css' import { useContext } from 'react'; import { UserContext } from './components/contexts/UserContext' export default function Profile() { const { user} = useContext(UserContext); // provide a default value for user const [edit, setEdit] = useState(user); const [imageFile, setImageFile] = useState(null); const [updatedUser, setUpdatedUser] = useState({ full_name: user.full_name, email: user.email, picture: user.picture, }); function editProfile(e) { setUpdatedUser({ ...updatedUser, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }); } return ( <>

setImageFile(e.target.files[0])} />
